QuestData.Title: Journey to Honor Hold
QuestData.Description: When you're ready, I'll arrange a flight straight to Honor Hold.$B$BFrom there, speak with Marshal Isildor and give him Duron's report. He'll be happy to see another recruit from the homelands, and I'm sure the information in that report is important stuff!
QuestData.LogDescription: Take a flight to Honor Hold and deliver Duron's Report to Marshal Isildor.
QuestData.CompletionText: Thank the Light you made it here safely. Honor Hold needs all the seasoned warriors it can muster.
QuestData.RewardText: Our expedition to this forsaken, wreck of a world has almost ground to a halt, $n. We encountered more resistance than we bargained for.$B$BAs if facing the Burning Legion again wasn't bad enough - there are horrors in this land unlike anything we've ever encountered.
